info.title: Howl Server API
info.description: This is an API that tests swagger integration

UserAccessToken.description: `id` is the FB app user ID, `token` the user access token, and `expires` is the token expiration date in `%FT%T%z` format

400.description: Invalid `token` or `offset` or `limit` or `distance` or `lon` or `lat`
Invalid `token` or `offset` or `limit` or `distance` or `lon` or `lat`
